text: Heavy rain is forecast in California beginning today, including in areas recently devastated by wildfires, making the risk of mudslides and flash flooding high. Make sure to heed all evacuation orders by local officials, and please stay safe. https://twitter.com/NWS/status/1065044372301983744 QT @NWS Multiple rounds of heavy rain and mountain snow are forecast for the West from Wednesday through #Thanksgiving into Friday. There is an elevated concern for flash flooding, mudslides and debris flows near wildfire burn scars in #California. See http://weather.gov for more. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsfKmWqWsAANET2.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsfKmW-WkAI8eLF.jpg
Fire victims and their families can search for loved ones and register themselves as safe and well at → https://safeandwell.communityos.org/cms/index.php

In an average month, 50 American women are shot and killed by current or former intimate partners in the United States. When discussing gun safety reforms, it’s crucial we also talk about domestic violence. 
https://twitter.com/NYTNational/status/1065093459869085696 QT @NYTNational Monday's shooting at a Chicago hospital started as a domestic dispute and escalated into large-scale violence https://trib.al/hip9ECX

If you are in a burn area, please stay alert this Thanksgiving weekend and be prepared to evacuate, if needed. Heavy rains could mean flooding, mudslides, or dangerous debris flows. 
https://twitter.com/KQED/status/1065084905590280194 QT @KQED Officials are warning that the heavy rains could mean flooding, mudslides, and more dangerous "debris flows." https://www.kqed.org/science/1934614/heavy-rains-bring-flood-risk-to-fire-ravaged-landscape?fbclid=IwAR1ahKyq2ghyVL0hMyOg1ieK-geG19X8UrNQid_xu61T8Ou12ClowER3DDk

For years, garbage heaps claiming to be colleges stayed in business because a shady accrediting agency gave them its rubber stamp. The Obama Admin shut it down – but @BetsyDeVosED is bringing it back to appease her #4profit pals. Congress must investigate. Thomas Farr’s record of defending voter suppression is undeniable, and a lifetime appointment would threaten the voting rights of all Americans. Full stop. https://www.thedailybeast.com/thomas-farr-devised-ways-to-keep-blacks-from-voting-mitch-mcconnell-wants-to-make-him-a-judge

85,000 children have starved to death during the Saudi-led intervention in Yemen.

The U.S. should not be part of Saudi Arabia's destructive foreign policy. Congress must end our participation in that war now, and help provide immediate humanitarian aid there to save lives.

We must end the race to the bottom where taxpayers in one city or state are forced to bid against each other for desperately needed jobs. Amazon & other large corporations do not need corporate welfare. Instead, they need to pay their fair share of taxes. https://newrepublic.com/article/152190/amazon-scammed-americas-hurting-cities
